body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for reaching out to Ward Auto Group. My name is Gregory Ward. May I know your name please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Melissa Robinson.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Melissa. Could you please provide me with your contact number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Melissa. Additionally, may I have your email address for our records?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for sharing that information. Is there anything specific you would like to discuss with us today regarding your experience with our shipping services?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling disappointed with the delayed delivery of my vehicle.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concerns, Melissa. We will investigate this matter further. Thank you for bringing it to our attention. We appreciate your patience. Is there anything else you would like to add before we proceed?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing your feedback, Melissa. We will do our best to resolve this issue promptly. We appreciate your time and cooperation. Have a great day!
